channel.title: Scattered Functional Thoughts
channel.description: A personal blog for what coding and programming stuff, mostly related to functional programming

item.title: About
item.description: So I’m starting this a place to write about all my side projects and new stuff I learn. I hope that you can find something interesting or…
item.content:encoded:
So I’m starting this a place to write about all my side projects and new stuff I learn.

I hope that you can find something interesting or helpful around here.
